item.title: How to create a multilingual site with Hugo
item.description: With Hugo, we can create a multilingual site. Configuration We first have to write in the config file what are the supported languages: config.yaml languages: en: title: Stéphane's Blog fr: title: Blog de Stéphane We can add a params block for each language to override some specific values depending on the language, for example labels or urls. Please note that the default language will be the one defined in the defaultContentLanguage parameter.
